short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: 🔐💰Cryptocurrency wallet for Tezos blockchain as Web Extension for your Browser.
short.de: Kryptowährungs-Wallet für Tezos-Blockchain als Web-Erweiterung für Ihren Browser.
short.fr: 🔐💰Portefeuille de cryptomonnaie pour le blockchain Tezos en tant qu'extension Web pour votre navigateur.
short.ja: 🔐💰テゾスブロックチェーン用のクリプトカレンシーウォレットをブラウザ用のWeb拡張機能として提供
short.ko: 🔐💰브라우저에 맞는 웹 익스텐선으로 테조스 블록체인용 암호화화폐 지갑을 사용합니다.
short.tr: Tarayıcınızda Web Uzantısı olarak Tezos blokzinciri için kripto para cüzdanı.
short.uk: 🔐💰Криптовалютний гаманець для блокчейну Тезос як Розширення для твого браузеру
short.zh_CN: 🔐💰浏览器扩展程序，适用于Tezos区块链的数字加密货币钱包。
short.zh_TW: 🔐💰這是 Tezos 區塊鏈加密貨幣錢包，是一項瀏覽器網頁擴充功能。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_US,e:
Temple Wallet is easy-to-use browser extension wallet for Tezos ecosystem. 

Temple provides the ability to interact with web-based decentralised applications (so-called "dApps") right from your browser.

Other important features include:
- Exploring various Tezos-based assets
- Easy account import from other Tezos wallets
- Multiple accounts
- Delegation to bakers
- FA1.2 / FA2 tokens
- Multiple networks
- Collectibles support
- Built-in DEX swaps

It is a fully open-source and audited wallet, you can observe its source code via the following link:

https://github.com/madfish-solutions/templewallet-extension

Security audit report by LeastAuthority:
https://leastauthority.com/static/publications/LeastAuthority_Tezos_Foundation_Thanos_Wallet_Audit_Report.pdf

Privacy Policy: https://templewallet.com/privacy

long.ru:
THIS IS STILL AN OPEN BETA! USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.

Thanos Wallet is an easy-to-use browser extension wallet for interacting with Tezos ecosystem.

Open Source! Check out the source code on Github:
https://github.com/madfish-solutions/thanos-wallet
